mapper.update:
update sys_role set
id = #{id},
name = #{name},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}

update sys_role set
id = #{id},
name = #{name},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}

update.foreach:
update sys_role set
id = #{ pojo.id },
name = #{ pojo.name },
create_time = #{ pojo.createTime },
update_time = #{ pojo.updateTime },
where
id = #{ pojo.id }

mapper.delete:
delete from sys_role where
id in
#{item}
and
id = #{id} and
name in
#{item}
and
name = #{name} and
create_time in
#{item}
and
create_time = #{createTime} and
update_time in
#{item}
and
update_time = #{updateTime} and

sql.trim: id as "id", name as "name", create_time as "createTime", update_time as "updateTime",

choose.otherwise: id as "id", name as "name", create_time as "createTime", update_time as "updateTime",

when.test: inParams != null and inParams.id != null and inParams.id.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.name != null and inParams.name.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.createTime != null and inParams.createTime.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.updateTime != null and inParams.updateTime.size() > 0
